\newcommand{\appdesco}[3]{\cellcolor[\sideco]{\sideso} & \cellcolor[\entco]{\entso} \multirow{1}{\twidth}{#1} & \cellcolor[\entco]{\entso} \multirow{1}{\dwidth}{\footnotesize{#2}} & \cellcolor[\entco]{\entso} \multirow{1}{\ewidth}{\footnotesize{#3}}}

\multicolumn{3}{c}{} \\
& \textbf{Tool} & \textbf{Function} & \textbf{Dependencies} \\

\appdesco{python binding}
	 {provides library class to the python language}
	 {required python environment} \\

\appdesce{swrx}
	 {simulates GPS signal and receiver tracking}
	 {too specialized} \\

\appdesco{Rinex plot}
	 {plots observable combinations}
	 {requires perl-tk} \\


\appdesce{mdptool}
	 {manipulates MDP data streams}
	 {requires UNIX terminal, networking} \\

\appdesco{ash2mdp}
	 {converts Ashtech Z(Y)-12 data to MDP}
	 {requires UNIX terminal and serial port} \\

\appdesce{rtAshtech}
	 {records observations from an Ashtech receiver}
	 {requires UNIX terminal and serial port} \\
